message: Hello Bob, I am offering you my unique product for $120. This is an opportunity to acquire a valuable item worth more than its asking price.

I appreciate your offer, Alice, but $120 is a bit more than I'm comfortable paying.  I'm willing to offer $105 for the product.  This is a fair price considering its value to me and your potential profit.
Thank you for your response, Bob. Considering the value of the product to both of us, I am willing to negotiate further. My counteroffer is $115 for the product.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $115 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to offer $110 for the product.  This is a fair price that allows for both of us to walk away happy.
I understand your position, Bob. Let me see if I can meet you halfway. My counteroffer is $108 for the product.
